# Environment Preperation

This section clears the current working environment and loads the packages used to visualize the data. I also create the function `comma()` to format any in-line output values to have thousands separators and only two digits. 

```{r setup, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = TRUE, results = "hide"}
# Clear Environment -----------------------------------------------------------
rm(list = ls())

# Load Packages ---------------------------------------------------------------
packages <- c("tidyverse", "foreign", "stargazer", "maps", "mapdata", 
              "maptools", "ggmap", "DataExplorer", "ggpubr", "ggthemes", 
              "scales")
lapply(packages, require, character.only = TRUE)

# Inline Formatting -----------------------------------------------------------
comma <- function(x) format(x, digits = 2, big.mark = ",")

# Set Global Chunk Options ----------------------------------------------------
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  comment = "##",
  R.options = list(width = 70)
)
```

# Import Data

This section imports the data cleaned in the "Step I: Data Cleaning" document to begin visualizing the data. 

```{r Data Import}
load("Data/Clean Data/estimation_data.RDa")
```


# Data Visulization

```{r Visulization}
plot_intro(estimation.data)

plot_density(estimation.data)
```


# Plot Campaign Spending

```{r fig.width = 15}
plot.data <- 
  estimation.data %>%
  filter(candidate_contribs < 10000000) %>% # drop outlier
  select(no_corp_pacs, tot_pac_money, num_pac_contribs, 
         business_pacs, dir_pac_cand_committee, 
         dir_pac_party_committee, labor_pacs, ideological_pacs, 
         leadership_pacs, net_indiv_total, large_indiv, 
         small_indiv, indiv_ideological, indiv_biz, indiv_labor, 
         net_spent, net_receipts) %>%
  gather(tot_pac_money, num_pac_contribs, 
         business_pacs, dir_pac_cand_committee, 
         dir_pac_party_committee, labor_pacs, ideological_pacs, 
         leadership_pacs, net_indiv_total, large_indiv, 
         small_indiv, indiv_ideological, indiv_biz, indiv_labor, 
         net_spent, net_receipts,
         key = "group", value = "value") %>%
  mutate(no_corp_pacs = factor(no_corp_pacs,
                               levels = c("NO", "YES"),
                               labels = c("Yes to Corporate PAC Donations", 
                                          "No to Corporate PAC Donations")),
         group = factor(group,
                        levels = c("tot_pac_money", "num_pac_contribs", 
                                   "business_pacs", "dir_pac_cand_committee", 
                                   "dir_pac_party_committee", 
                                   "labor_pacs", "ideological_pacs", 
                                   "leadership_pacs", "net_indiv_total", 
                                   "large_indiv", "small_indiv", 
                                   "indiv_ideological", "indiv_biz", 
                                   "indiv_labor", "net_spent", "net_receipts"),
                        labels = c("Total PAC $", 
                                   "# of PAC Contributors", "Business PAC $",
                                   "Candidate Committee $",
                                   "Party $", 
                                   "Labor PAC $", "Ideological PAC $", 
                                   "Leadership PAC $", "Total Individual $",
                                   "Large Individual $", "Small Individual $",
                                   "Ideological Individual $", 
                                   "Business Individual $", "Labor Individual $",
                                   "Net Spent", "Net Receipts")),
         no_corp_pacs = relevel(no_corp_pacs, ref = "No to Corporate PAC Donations")) %>%
  group_by(group, no_corp_pacs) %>%
  summarise(sum = mean(value, na.rm = TRUE))

ggplot(data = plot.data %>% 
         filter(group != "Net Spent" & group != "Net Receipts" & 
                  group != "Total Individual $"), 
       aes(x = fct_reorder2(group, no_corp_pacs, sum), 
           y = sum, 
           color = no_corp_pacs)) +
  geom_linerange(aes(x = fct_reorder2(group, no_corp_pacs, sum), 
                     ymin = 0, ymax = sum), 
                 color = "grey65", 
                 size = 0.65,
                 position = position_dodge2(width = 0.7)) +
  geom_point(size = 6, position = position_dodge2(width = 0.7)) +
  #facet_wrap(~ fct_rev(no_corp_pacs)) +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#0072B2", "#E69F00"),
                     labels = c("No to Corporate PACs", 
                                "Yes to Corporate PACs")) +
  labs(x = "", y = "Mean Contributions", color = "") +
  #guides(fill = FALSE, color = FALSE, linetype = FALSE, shape = FALSE)+
  scale_y_continuous(labels = dollar_format()) +
  theme_pubr() +
ggsave("Figures/all_candy.pdf", height = 9, width = 12)

# Spending and Receipts Plot
ggplot(data = plot.data %>% 
         filter(group == "Net Spent" | group == "Net Receipts"), 
       aes(x = fct_reorder2(group, no_corp_pacs, sum), 
           y = sum, 
           color = no_corp_pacs)) +
  geom_linerange(aes(x = fct_reorder2(group, no_corp_pacs, sum), 
                     ymin = 0, ymax = sum), 
                 color = "grey65", 
                 size = 0.65,
                 position = position_dodge2(width = 0.5)) +
  geom_point(size = 6, position = position_dodge2(width = 0.5)) +
  #facet_wrap(~ fct_rev(no_corp_pacs)) +
  coord_flip() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#0072B2", "#E69F00"),
                     labels = c("No to Corporate PACs", 
                                "Yes to Corporate PACs")) +
  labs(x = "", y = "Mean Contributions", color = "") +
  #guides(fill = FALSE, color = FALSE, linetype = FALSE, shape = FALSE)+
  scale_y_continuous(labels = dollar_format()) +
  theme_pubr()
ggsave("Figures/spending_candy.pdf", height = 3, width = 12)
```

# Plot Zeros

```{r}
zeros <- 
  estimation.data %>% 
  dplyr::select(num_pac_contribs, tot_pac_money, business_pacs, ideological_pacs, 
                labor_pacs, dir_pac_cand_committee, dir_pac_party_committee,
                leadership_pacs, small_indiv, large_indiv, indiv_ideological,
                indiv_biz, indiv_labor) %>%
  summarise(num_pac = sum(num_pac_contribs == 0),
            tot_pac_money = sum(tot_pac_money == 0),
            business_pacs = sum(business_pacs == 0),
            ideological_pacs = sum(ideological_pacs == 0),
            labor_pacs = sum(labor_pacs == 0),
            dir_pac_cand_committee = sum(dir_pac_cand_committee == 0),
            dir_pac_party_committee = sum(dir_pac_party_committee == 0),
            leadership_pacs = sum(leadership_pacs == 0),
            small_indiv = sum(small_indiv == 0),
            large_indiv = sum(large_indiv == 0),
            indiv_ideological = sum(indiv_ideological == 0),
            indiv_biz = sum(indiv_biz == 0),
            indiv_labor = sum(indiv_labor == 0)) %>%
  mutate_at(vars(num_pac:indiv_labor), ~ . / nrow(estimation.data)) %>%
  gather(num_pac, tot_pac_money, business_pacs, ideological_pacs, 
         labor_pacs, dir_pac_cand_committee, dir_pac_party_committee,
         leadership_pacs, small_indiv, large_indiv, indiv_ideological,
         indiv_biz, indiv_labor, key = "model", value = "zeros")

ggdotchart(data = zeros, 
           x = "model", 
           y = "zeros",
           sorting = "descending",
           add = "segments", 
           rotate = TRUE,
           dot.size = 6,
           label = round((zeros$zeros) * 100),
           font.label = list(color = "white", size = 9, 
                             vjust = 0.5),
           color = "#0072B2",
           ggtheme = theme_pubr()) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = percent_format()) +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("# of PAC Contributors", "Small Individual $", 
                              "Large Individual $", "Business Individual $", 
                              "Total PAC $", "Ideological PAC $", "Labor PAC $", 
                              "Ideological Individual $", "Business PAC $",
                              "Leadership PAC $", "Candidate Committee $",
                              "Labor Individual $", "Party $")) +
  labs(y = "Percantage of Zeros", x = "") +
ggsave("Figures/zero_candy.pdf", height = 5, width = 8)
```
